item.description:
We are posting this on our site but please follow the directions below!


"Spirit of Boston" dinner & dance cruise for Jewish singles 40+ on 8/14

Date Me I'm Jewish is pleased to announce our gala summer event
on August 14th on the "SPIRIT of BOSTON"

Join us for an evening to remember from 6:30 to 10:00 PM for only $89.00. Price valid until 8/7/08 ($99.00 after)

This price includes a grand buffet dinner with carving station, gourmet desserts, coffee and tea, a spectacular music review by the "Spirit" entertainers, DJ, dancing, cruise with romantic waterfront views of historic Boston, meal tax, gratuities and free parking at the Seaport hotel.

Dress is from business casual to cocktail attire.

RESERVE NOW! SPACE IS LIMITED.

For more information, see our flier and registration form at http://singles.meetup...

To reserve your space, send check with completed registration form to Date Me I'm Jewish, PO Box 82, Brockton, MA 02303-0082. We also accept PayPal. Any questions please call Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049.
item.name: Spirit of Boston Cruise
